properties.description: Visit any of our libraries in Kent for a warm welcome. properties.address: Christ Church, Park Wood, Kent ME15 9JW
properties.description: A space for all ages to come and have a cup of coffee and some great company. Children are welcome and we have toys ready and waiting to be played with. As well as some games like parachutes and indoor snowball fights for them to join in with on occasion. For you adults come along and be a part of this amazing community, it's a very relaxed and welcoming environment. And if you want some time with just adults we have the break room from 13:30 - 14:30 which is adults only
properties.title: Celebration Church UK

properties.description: Fusion is a welcoming and fully-accessible, healthy living centre in the heart of Park Wood in Kent, where we run a broad range of activities and services designed to help local people feel healthier, happier, more connected and able to make friends. Anyone is welcome and our staff and volunteers are always on hand to help you in any way they can. Pop in, we'd love to meet you.

properties.address: The Net Community Hub, Chatham, Kent ME5 0QX
properties.description: The Net Community Hub is a small community space in Weedswood, offering a range of sessions, support groups and access to local agencies. Our aim is to benefit vulnerable Walderslade residents of all ages, but with a particular interest on the elderly and isolated, by providing inclusive recreational opportunities to improve their health and wellbeing and reduce social isolation.

Having you there really helps to create a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
